languages.text: "Нет!" {n} Маттис вскрикивает.{/n} "Вы не могли о таком умолчать! Не могли так... поступить!"

traits.locale_text: "Нет!" {n} Маттис вскрикивает.{/n} "Вы не могли о таком умолчать! Не могли так... поступить!"

languages.text: "No!" {n}Mattis screams.{/n} "How could you keep something like that to yourselves? How could you... How could you!"
languages.original_text: "Нет!" {n} Маттис вскрикивает.{/n} "Вы не могли о таком умолчать! Не могли так... поступить!"

traits.locale_text: "No!" {n}Mattis shrieks.{/n} "How could you stay silent about something like that! How could you... do it!"

languages.text: « Non ! {n}hurle Mattis.{/n} Comment avez-vous pu me cacher une chose pareille ? Comment avez-vous pu... ? Honte à vous ! »
languages.original_text: "No!" {n}Mattis screams.{/n} "How could you keep something like that to yourselves? How could you... How could you!"

traits.locale_text: « Non ! {n}hurle Mattis.{/n} Comment avez-vous pu me cacher une chose pareille ? Comment avez-vous pu... ? Honte à vous ! »

languages.text: «¡No!». {n}Mattis grita.{/n} «¿Cómo podéis habernos escondido algo así? ¿Cómo habéis podido...? ¡¿Cómo os atrevéis?!».
languages.original_text: "No!" {n}Mattis screams.{/n} "How could you keep something like that to yourselves? How could you... How could you!"

traits.locale_text: «¡No!». {n}Mattis grita.{/n} «¿Cómo podéis habernos escondido algo así? ¿Cómo habéis podido...? ¡¿Cómo os atrevéis?!».

languages.text: 「やめてくれ！」{n}マティスが叫ぶ。{/n}「そんなことを隠しておけるなんて、よくも…どうしてなんだ！」
languages.original_text: "No!" {n}Mattis screams.{/n} "How could you keep something like that to yourselves? How could you... How could you!"

traits.locale_text: 「やめてくれ！」{n}マティスが叫ぶ。{/n}「そんなことを隠しておけるなんて、よくも…どうしてなんだ！」

languages.text: “不！”{n}马蒂斯尖叫起来。{/n}“这种事情你们怎么可以瞒着我们？你们怎么可以……怎么可以这样！”
languages.original_text: "No!" {n}Mattis screams.{/n} "How could you keep something like that to yourselves? How could you... How could you!"

traits.locale_text: “不！”{n}马蒂斯尖叫起来。{/n}“这种事情你们怎么可以瞒着我们？你们怎么可以……怎么可以这样！”

languages.text: "Nein!"{n}, schreit Mattis.{/n} "Wie konntet Ihr so etwas für Euch behalten? Wie konntet Ihr nur ... Wie konntet Ihr!"
languages.original_text: "No!" {n}Mattis screams.{/n} "How could you keep something like that to yourselves? How could you... How could you!"

traits.locale_text: "Nein!"{n}, schreit Mattis.{/n} "Wie konntet Ihr so etwas für Euch behalten? Wie konntet Ihr nur ... Wie konntet Ihr!"

languages.text: "Hayır!" {n}Mattis çığlık atıyor.{/n} "Böyle bir şeyi nasıl saklarsınız? Nasıl yapabildiniz... Nasıl?"
languages.original_text: "No!" {n}Mattis screams.{/n} "How could you keep something like that to yourselves? How could you... How could you!"
